__e: So what were the most important things that happened before that?
Hey, what happened to you, kid?
I could see it happening to you, Letitia, not to me.
You have to tell us what happened, Aurelan, to you and the others.
I want to know Everything that you've been up to since I last saw you.
I don't know what happened to you but it's not my fault, for sure.
Why is it that you get to hear about my day but I'm not allowed to know what happened to you?
Dad has anything ever happened to you that was so weird...
It has passed him/her that somebody dies and he/she doesn't want to recognize it.
Haven't there been times in the past when you've felt just a little bit lost and lonely?
It has passed him/her that somebody dies and he/she doesn't want to recognize it.
You ever think maybe I wanted something else, too?
Frank, you never even consider that this gift that you have could be lying to you.
Have you ever felt someone dying in your arms?
Did you happen to think of me?
Have you ever seen something coming, and didn't do what you could to stop it?
Have you ever felt someone dying in your arms?
Did you happen to think of me?
Have you ever seen something coming, and didn't do what you could to stop it?
Did it occur to you that I might have wanted to go on somewhere with them?
Did it ever occur to you that maybe the rest of us had a plan too?
I guess it never occurred to you that they'd make me look like a fool.
As a whining baby you brought me up, gave the little fellow clothes to keep him warm. But how did you get me in the first place?
What was it that gave you the idea to do this project?
Knowing that, you still don't care what happens to you?
You'll be late for your meeting, unless you don't care...
You talk about your conscience, but I mean so little to you.
